Among my most admired photographers are Fan Ho and Alan Schaller.

The photos here are my experiments with light and shadow and playing around with the buttons and dials on my Alpha A7 III predominantly with the Tamron 28-75mm F2.8 G1 and a Tamron 35-150mm F2-2.8 to serve the photons fresh and hot to the BSI CMOS sensor.

Best enjoyed in hi-res on your laptop or any other big screen â€¦
